Class YoutubeRelatedSites

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.YoutubeRelatedSites

  • public class YoutubeRelatedSites
extends java.lang.Object
    Get the so called "related links" of a Youtube channel page
    Author:
    Maximilian von Gaisberg (Grunzwanzling)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YoutubeRelatedSites(java.net.URL channelURL)
      Analyze a YouTube-channel and filter out all the related sites
